
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/chejiangyi/p/19001012" title="发布于 2025-07-23 16:40">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">bsfgo 一个轻量级的go gin框架,用于web站点和api开发【开源】</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                    <div id="cnblogs_post_description" style="display: none">
        <img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/815689/202507/815689-20250723163559972-122263237.png" alt="bsfgo 一个轻量级的go gin框架,用于web站点和api开发【开源】" class="desc_img">
        bsf的go版本，一个轻量级的go gin框架,用于web站点和api开发。
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1>bsfgo</h1>
<p><img alt="" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/815689/202507/815689-20250723150636150-1081157693.icon" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>一个轻量级的go gin框架,用于web站点和api开发，也是<a title="bsf java" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/free-bsf-all" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">bsf java</a>的go版本。</p>
<p>开源地址:&nbsp;<a title="bsfgo web开发框架 -- 车江毅" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo</a></p>
<h4><a id="user-content-介绍" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>介绍</h4>
<ol>
<li>bsf的go版本bsfgo,期望通过集成常用组件，沉淀一系列工具及ai辅助编程，提高go的开发效率和开发标准化(集成和使用)。</li>
<li>基于bsfgo,提供一套标准脚手架及配套cicd,让开发人员快速构建应用。</li>
<li>目标: 简单,高效 (新人10分钟上手项目开发，1小时了解框架实现)。</li>
</ol>
<h4><a id="user-content-软件架构" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E8%BD%AF%E4%BB%B6%E6%9E%B6%E6%9E%84" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>软件架构</h4>
<div class="markdown-code-block">
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>--<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> core   (核心工具库,提供基础类及一系列Util工具) 
</span>--<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> redis2 (redis集成工具库)
</span>--<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> kafka2 (kafka集成工具库)
</span>--<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> gorm2  (gorm集成工具库)
</span>--<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> gin2   (gin集成web及api标准开发基础框架)
</span>--<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> demo   (提供拷贝即用的标准项目开发脚手架模版)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">go</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.work   项目工作区管理文件
replace_version.</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">go</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> 模块版本升级工具
publish_tags.sh    模块打包提交工具
project_init.</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">go</span>    脚手架快速生成工具</pre>
</div>
</div>
<h4><a id="user-content-设计理念" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E8%AE%BE%E8%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E5%BF%B5" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>设计理念</h4>
<div class="markdown-code-block">
<pre><code class="hljs hljs-">1. 工具优先: 开箱即用,不用也可。
2. 默认优先: 默认最佳调优,无需额外配置。
3. 效率优先: 效率简洁高于性能极致追求。
</code></pre>
<div class="markdown-code-block-copy-btn">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
<h4><a id="user-content-快速使用" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>快速使用</h4>
<div class="markdown-code-block">
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">require (
    gitee.com</span>/chejiangyi/bsfgo/core v1.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0.6</span>-beta.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    gitee.com</span>/chejiangyi/bsfgo/gin2 v1.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0.6</span>-beta.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    gitee.com</span>/chejiangyi/bsfgo/kafka2 v1.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0.6</span>-beta.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    gitee.com</span>/chejiangyi/bsfgo/redis2 v1.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">0.6</span>-beta.<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    ...
)</span></pre>
</div>
</div>
<h4><a id="user-content-常用集成库" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E5%B8%B8%E7%94%A8%E9%9B%86%E6%88%90%E5%BA%93" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>常用集成库</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/redis.md" rel="noopener nofollow">redis 使用</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/kafka.md" rel="noopener nofollow">kafka 使用</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/gorm.md" rel="noopener nofollow">gorm 使用</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/db.md" rel="noopener nofollow">db 使用</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/http.md" rel="noopener nofollow">http 使用</a></li>
</ul>
<h4><a id="user-content-gin-web集成库" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#gin-web%E9%9B%86%E6%88%90%E5%BA%93" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>gin Web集成库</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/quick_start.md" rel="noopener nofollow">快速开发</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/middleware.md" rel="noopener nofollow">middleware 扩展</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/route.md" rel="noopener nofollow">route 工具</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/session.md" rel="noopener nofollow">session 工具</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/swagger.md" rel="noopener nofollow">swagger 工具</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/template.md" rel="noopener nofollow">template 模版渲染</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/token.md" rel="noopener nofollow">token 开发</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/page.md" rel="noopener nofollow">分页组件</a></li>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/config.md" rel="noopener nofollow">配置使用</a></li>
</ul>
<h4><a id="user-content-脚手架集成" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E8%84%9A%E6%89%8B%E6%9E%B6%E9%9B%86%E6%88%90" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>脚手架集成</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/demo.md" rel="noopener nofollow">demo 脚手架</a></li>
</ul>
<h4><a id="user-content-组件打包发布" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E7%BB%84%E4%BB%B6%E6%89%93%E5%8C%85%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>组件打包发布</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo/blob/v1.0.8/_doc/publish.md" rel="noopener nofollow">模块版本升级及打包提交</a></li>
</ul>
<h4><a id="user-content-未来扩展" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E6%9C%AA%E6%9D%A5%E6%89%A9%E5%B1%95" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>未来扩展</h4>
<ol>
<li>health健康监控及上报</li>
<li>elasticsearch 集成</li>
<li>...</li>
</ol>
<h4><a id="user-content-版本更新记录" class="anchor" href="https://gitee.com/chejiangyi/bsfgo#%E7%89%88%E6%9C%AC%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B0%E8%AE%B0%E5%BD%95" rel="noopener nofollow"></a>版本更新记录</h4>
